messages.message: Hope you and Iga are better! I am well. Don still has a touch of the flu.

Brian
Yeah, mostly, my nose is still a little runny.
January sucks. Get better soon. How is Iga?

Brian
She is good.  She is painting again with a new color wheel that comes with 50 different paints.  I didn't know so many colors existed with all different names.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uMK0prafzw0

DIE ANTWOORD - UGLY BOY
DONKER MAG out now on iTunes: http://bzz.is/donkermag_it + Amazon: http://bzz.is/donkermag_amz. Website: http://dieantwoord.com Facebook: https://www.faceboo...
youtube.com

Awesome. I didn't know she painted. There are actually colors we cannot even see. What is this? Music?
Will check it out tomorrow. Thanks. Going to bed. Hope we can all get together soon. Get better.

Brian
Yes, music.
Thanks, talk to you soon.
Nite.

Brian
Goodnight
Hi Brian, what does Iga want for her birthday? I know she paints. Does she want anything for that? Take care & see you at the party. Teresa

Brian
Not sure what Iga wants.  Probably just for you guys to come hang out tomorrow.  I am really bad at birthday gifts.
Love to hang out with you both. I got her a necklace. Well, I bought two & now have to decide which one to give her & which one to keep lol. See you soon. Teresa

Brian
Can you send me a picture?
Just saw this sorry. Texted it to you. No matter what I do the choker comes out looking purplish but is shiny silver & gold.

Hi Brian, our house is now live and active if want to send this to Gabrie or anyone else you might know that is interested. You two will just have to come visit us in CO when we move. Here it is http://www.flexmls.com/cgi-bin/mainmenu.cgi?cmd=url+other/run_public_link.html&public_link_tech_id=1533wfa10hk1&s=12&cid=1
flexmls
flexmls.com

Brian
Cool, I'll forward it to him.

K thank you. We are going out of town this weekend & there will be an open house Sat & Sun 10-6 but if he wants a special showing he can call our agent Karen Santaella  at 602-363-4933. Say hi to Iga. Take care. Hope to see you both soon. Teresa

Brian
I thought of something, does your genetics testing show what diseases people are prone to?  Even based on region some regions are more prone to certain diseases right?
Answer to your first question- No. The FDA clamped down on 23/Me doing this because you do not have a doctor to consult. It is true though that some regions are more prone to certain diseases though.
Hey Brian, we just discovered that you can get lightning speed internet here! You can only get it a few places in the world. Lots of techie jobs - just don't know if the right one for you.
Goodbye Verizon! Hello ultra high speed fiber optic Internet!http://www.usatoday.com/story/news/nation/2014/11/19/longmont-internet-service/19294335/

Brian
sweet

Yes! And anyone with a public library card here can do research in university databases at home. You have more places to research like that than I did as an adjunct professor at PVCC! That is not available in Phoenix, or most places, so I bought Don the very expensive scientific  magazine Nature for his birthday with online access when I quit teaching. Here, anyone can access that with their library card info & countless others!

Hi Brian! How are you & Iga? Come see us some time! Think talking politics is off the table though. Please don't post anti- Hillary stuff on my page again. I am a big Hillary fan. This is a picture I made when we went to go see her in Denver. I consider my wall like my living room. I don't post Hillary stuff on your FB wall. Do not want to block you. Thanks, Teresa
Guess if you write back I proved you exist lol!

Brian
Sure, we would love to come visit you in your real life living room!  I think Facebook has a lot of noise and posting arguments or hate speech about people is adding to it.  I appreciate you and your kindness
I will be so glad when the damn election is over. I think we can both agree with that!

Brian
I just wish someone as smart as you wouldn't be so set in their ways!  No one trusts either candidate.  They both suck.
Would love to see you both. We have a complete basement apartment - added a kitchen with stove. We rent it though so you would have to get up with Don about when you could as far as dates.

Brian
But I would never block you
Because I respect your brain.
I disagree. But I respect you as well.

Brian
We will know more after November.  I lost my job and might be getting a job at Pacific Northwest National Laboratory.  I am so excited!

Disagree about both of the candidates being awful. Is your job in Phoenix?
But don't want to argue about it with you.

Brian
Arguing is the only way we can gain a deeper understanding of what is important to us.  What differs between you and I is age.  I appreciate that difference and respect you more for it.  You are a role model and a my stars.  Hows the hubby?  He is a genius.  I love his book.
Job will be outside portland
in Richland

Okay, fine. She isn't perfect. But to compare them as equally bad is a false equivalency. She isn't my BFF. I don't need a candidate to be. But she isn't a xenophobic, sexist maniac that our counterintelligence says is a danger to our national security. And the most important thing is the Supreme Court as there will be 2-3 appointments made by the next President which will either put us on a path of progressive politics or regressive ones for the next 40 years. Also, global warming. Trump thinks it is a hoax made up by the Chinese. She has an extensive plan for that & said she would ask advice of all Democrats & progressives on issues- Bernie, Obama, etc. Trump says he knows more than the generals & has a very good brain- not really. People said they thought Gore was boring & voted for Nader. We got Bush . All the allegations against her are conspiracy theories that the GOP dreamed up to attack the Clintons & destroy the Democratic Party. Read the whistleblower book, Killing the Messenger, by David Brock who was a Republican in on it at the time & changed to a Democratic activist. Also, Don was in an actual board room of Bauer when people were plotting crap about her. All the pharmaceutical & health insurance companies were pissed because they were so popular & she tried to get us universal healthcare. They spent billions along with the GOP & Koch brothers to plant fake scandals & the idea that she is a liar ( not according to facts- Politifact - as honest as  Bernie. We lived through the Clinton years. Everyone had a job & we were at peace. I am in FL on vacation. My daughter is having a baby girl any day, Isabel. Oregon is much better than Phoenix I hear. Much more liberal & lots of young people but never been there. Not so hot. Thank you for your kind words & give my love to Iga. When do you go to Oregon?

Brian
wow.  I'll have to read.

Brian
very insightful!
Just hold your nose & think of the Supreme Court!!!

Brian
Courts are a waste of time.  If everyone already knew right from wrong, they wouldn't have a purpose at all.
Agree disagree?

No, you don't get it. They could reverse things like gay marriage, block or repeal any kind of healthcare, affordable college,  voting rights, Roe vs. Wade. And that is exactly what Trump & Pence Ave said they would do & they are appointed for life. Like it or not, they are the law of the land. Pence is a crazy RW radical Christian. Trump has hinted that he doesn't want to do all that stuff. Pence could be another Cheney.

Read this article: https://www.thenation.com/article/the-supreme-court-is-the-most-important-issue-in-the-2016-election/
The Supreme Court Is the Most Important Issue in the 2016 Election
Healthcare, gay marriage, voting rights, affirmative action, reproductive rights, labor rights, immigration, climate change. These are some of the crucial issues that have come before the Supreme Court in recent years or will be heard this year.
thenation.com

Brian
Right I agree completely.  I am just thinking if they ended up NOT reversing gay marriage, then that isn't a good basis for a decision.  Let's say hypothetically Trump gets elected and everything continues as normal.  Then the decision to vote for Hillary doesn't matter because everything is normal.  You can't base a political decision on a hypothetical scenario.

Brian
Oh that is new information I'll read it.

I am not doing that. I like Hillary, but if you do not think Supreme Court. Think global warming.
Okay, must run. Bye!

Brian
Is global warming in that article?
Ok, let's talk again privately soon.

No. Trump came out and said he thinks it is a hoax. Plan: Do nothing. She has a plan. https://www.hillaryclinton.com/issues/climate/ Okay. Bye!
Hillary on climate change
Taking on the threat of climate change and making America the worldâ€™s clean energy superpower.
hillaryclinton.com
Happy birthday!!!!

Brian
Thank you!
We have the same birthday!!! LOL

Brian
Happy birthday!
Thank you!
